name: Dragon Daycare (mrodyakin, Techxorcist, Various Breads)
description:
Created for the Global Game Jam 2023 in 48 hours.

Your wizard friend has asked you to petsit their dragon while they hop off to Malibu. This should be all fine and dandy, but the dragon has an unfortunate penchant for setting the uber important magical tree you're taking care of on fire. Use your water magic to keep nature safe until your friend returns from vacation.

Instructions:

Select your difficulty.

Press spacebar to jump.

Left click to use your water magic to extinguish fires around the map. Days will progress when all fires are extinguished -- if the Extraordinary Tree's health runs out, the game is over.

Jump on vine  to travel.

Credits:

Callum Holland - The vine tangler (Game Design + Everything else)
Miles Rodyakin - The text maker (UI Design + Writing)
Ben Wheatley - The tree placer (Level Design)
